availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: James Robert Dupuy (Commonwealth's Atty Louisville (7th) district)

body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, commonwealth's attorney. Shelby County, Kentucky, native. Married to Florence Low Dupuy. Father of Andrew L. Dupuy, Robert Y. Dupuy, and Florence Dupuy. Attended law school at Harvard University in Cambridge, Massachusetts, from 1856 to 1857 and at Transylvania University in Lexington, Kentucky in 1857. Commonwealth's attorney for the Seventh Judicial District of Kentucky from 1862 to 1866.
